nodes.documentation: @title This contract enables you to create pausable mechanism to stop in case of emergency.
nodes.name: CustomPausable

nodes.documentation: @notice Verifies whether the contract is not paused.
nodes.name: whenNotPaused

nodes.documentation: @notice Verifies whether the contract is paused.
nodes.name: whenPaused

nodes.documentation: @notice Unpauses the contract and returns to normal state.
nodes.name: unpause
